The following has special meaning:
green underline denotes added text
red struck out text denotes deleted text
2025 NY A 3993
Author: Forrest
Version: Introduced
Version Date: 01/30/2025

STATE OF NEW YORK

3993

2025-2026 Regular Sessions

IN ASSEMBLY

January 30, 2025

Introduced by M. of A. FORREST -- read once and referred to the Committee on Insurance

AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting discrimination through the use of clinical algorithms

The People of the State of New York, represented in Senate and Assembly, do enact as follows:

Section 1. The insurance law is amended by adding a new section 3243-a to read as follows:

Section 3243-a. Discrimination through use of clinical algorithms. (a) An insurer subject to this article shall not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability through the use of clinical algorithms in its decision-making.

(b) This section shall not prohibit the use of clinical algorithms that rely on variables to appropriately make decisions, including to identify, evaluate, and address health disparities.

Section 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


Copyright © 2025 State Net

Insurance

AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting discrimination
through the use of clinical algorithms

**The People of the State of New York, represented in Senate and Assembly, do
enact as follows:**

Section 1. The insurance law is amended by adding a new section 3243-a to read
as follows:

_Section 3243-a. Discrimination through use of clinical algorithms. (a) An
insurer subject to this article shall not discriminate on the basis of race,
color, national origin, sex, age, or disability through the use of clinical
algorithms in its decision-making._

_(b) This section shall not prohibit the use of clinical algorithms that rely
on variables to appropriately make decisions, including to identify, evaluate,
and address health disparities._

Section 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
